author: Sam Russell
title: Fanatics Sportsbook Promo Code for PHI-TB, NFL Wild Card Games - Bleacher Nation
text: Thanks to ridiculous weather in Buffalo, the NFL Wild Card round gets a Monday doubleheader! You can use a [Fanatics Sportsbook](https://www.bleachernation.com/fanatics-promo-code/) promo code to bet on the Bills-Steelers or Eagles-Bucs. Check out the details! What is the Fanatics Sportsbook Promo Code? The Fanatics Sportsbook [promo code](https://switchboard.actionnetwork.com/offers?affiliateId=1228&dynamic=true&context=web-book-state-review&propertyId=45) scores you up to $200 in bonus bets for just a $10 bet each day for five straight days. If you bet $10 on any market, you get $40 in FanCash! FanCash can be redeemed as bonus bets. Make a $10 bet the next day, and earn $40 more up to a maximum of five straight days for $200 in bonus bets! Get started today by betting at least $10 on an NFL Wild Card game. Claiming the Fanatics Sportsbook Promo Code Want to claim this Fanatics promo code? Follow these steps. - Register as a new user with [Fanatics Sportsbook](https://switchboard.actionnetwork.com/offers?affiliateId=1228&dynamic=true&context=web-book-state-review&propertyId=45). - Agree to the terms and conditions. - Geolocation checks you are located in a legal state for betting. - Make your first deposit with Fanatics. - Place at least a $10 bet for 5 days in a row. - Earn up to $200 in FanCash! ($40 a day) NFL Wild Card Games for Monday, Jan. 15 Today’s action features last year’s Super Bowl runner-up as the Eagles take on the Buccaneers. Also, we get the rescheduled Steelers at Bills game at 4:30 pm ET. Check out the odds. Bills vs Steelers (4:30 pm ET) The Bills and Steelers have been battling horrible weather and waiting all weekend for this matchup. It’s finally here and the Bills find themselves favored after finishing the season 11-6 with an AFC East Division Title. - Moneyline: Steelers (+380) at Bills (-500) - Spread: Bills (-10) - Total: O/U 38.5 Eagles at Bucs (8 pm ET) The Eagles have been sliding in the wrong direction and missed out on an NFC East Title. They find themselves in a Wild Card spot and slight favorites on the road vs the NFC South Champion Tampa Bay Buccaneers. - Moneyline: Eagles (-148) at Bucs (+125) - Spread: Eagles (-2.5) - Total: O/U 43.5 21+ and Gambling problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER.
